Camden.Coriell Institute for Medical Research: The Coriell Institute for Medical Research is an independent, non-profit research center dedicated to the study of the human genome. Coriell features programs in the fields of personalized medicine, cell biology, cytogenetics, genotyping, induced pluripotent stem cell science and biobanking. Located in downtown Camden, New Jersey, the Institute is partnered with several prominent state and national health leaders, including Cooper University Hospital, the Cooper Medical School of Rowan University, the United States Air Force, the University of Pennsylvania, Stanford University.
